channel.title: Post-Installation Settings?
channel.description: Hello Fellow Whonix Users, I have successfully installed Gateway & Workstation but I am concerned that there might be settings to enhance anonymity that I do not know about. Are the VM's good to go after installation or do I need to do more? Thanks...gnome

item.title: Post-Installation Settings?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Additional information on how to stay secure after installing Whonix may be found here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Post_Install_Advice

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: Post-Installation Settings?

item.description:
Hello Fellow Whonix Users,
